price: Darating ang bawat kaluluwa na may kasama itong isang [anghel na] tagaakay at isang [anghel na] saksi [sa mga salita niya at mga gawa niya].
arabic: وَجَآءَتۡ كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ مَّعَهَا سَآئِقٞ وَشَهِيدٞ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajāat kullu nafsin maʿahā sāiqun washahīdun
